name: Storm Rider (Tim Lane)
description:
Pilot an airship through the skies in this endless runner where you must collect lightning to keep going and travel as far as you can! Made for the Games Wales Q4 2021 jam.

Credits:

  • SFX: Luke Evans
  • Music: Tom Jones
  • Airship art: Courtney Davies

Additional assets:

  • Charge meter: https://opengameart.org/content/loading-bar
  • Clouds: https://kassjak.itch.io/20-clouds-pack
  • Lightning effect: https://opengameart.org/content/radial-lightning-effect
